Package com.cognixia.jumplus.dollarsbank.dao

Interface AccountDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountController
public interface AccountDAO
The DAO for account.
Version:
v1 (09/16/2020)
Author:
Lori White

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Account add​(Account account)
    Adds an account.
    boolean existsByNumber​(java.lang.String accountNumber)
    Finds whether an account exists by account number.
    Account getByNumber​(java.lang.String accountNumber)
    Retrieves an account by account number.
    boolean update​(Account account, java.lang.String column)
    Updates an account.

  • Method Details

    • getByNumber

      Account getByNumber​(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Retrieves an account by account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account's number to search by
      Returns:
      Account - the account found by account number

    • existsByNumber

      boolean existsByNumber​(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Finds whether an account exists by account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account's number to search by
      Returns:
      boolean - whether an account exists by account number

    • update

      boolean update​(Account account, java.lang.String column)
      Updates an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to update
      column - the specific column to update or if null update all
      Returns:
      boolean - whether the account was updated

    • add

      Account add​(Account account)
      Adds an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to add
      Returns:
      Account - the account that was added
